testCase.bodyParameters:
topic = Inventory
Message type of Event = ObjectDeletion
ObjectCreation.objectName = { (MD=md1; ME=me1) }
ObjectCreation.objectType = OT_MANAGED_ELEMENT
testCase.description: The EMS OS sends a notification. No OS has subscribed to receive it.

postconditions.success: As no OS has subscribed to receive this notification, the notification is lost.
postconditions.failure: The notification is received by one of the OS.

tests.comments:
CommunicationPattern = SimpleResponse
CommunicationStyle = MSG
Only the tested parameters are represented.
